hex_points.blurb: A settlement struggling to survive amidst barren fields.
The remnants of a once-grand cathedral, now a grim site of decay.
Caves that echo with the cries of famished beasts.
A relic shrine to forgotten gods, now desecrated.
An underground maze once used for worship, now infested with horrors.
A small group of survivors, wary of outsiders.
An old forge, its fires dimmed but still capable of revival.
A flickering portal, unstable and dangerous, leading to unknown realms.
A village that scavenges the bones of the land for survival.
The remains of a market square, haunted by memories.
A den of famine beasts that lurk beneath.
A shrine half-buried, promising hope to the desperate.
Dark catacombs that extend under the remnants of ancient structures.
A place of rest for weary travelers, filled with tension.
A forge where the last cinders of hope are reignited.
A portal that whispers lost dreams.
A cluster of homes made from scavenged materials.
The bones of a once-majestic tower that has succumbed to time.
A cave system filled with gluttonous shadows.
An altar dedicated to survival at all costs.
An abandoned crypt among the fields of bones.
A desperate village surrounded by fields of famine.
Remnants of a granary now turned to dust.
A pit where the famished beasts gather.
A twisted shrine to forgotten deities of hunger.
A shimmering portal that flickers with ominous energy.

quests.title: The Last Grain of Hope
quests.summary: Find and deliver the last grain of food to a starving village.
steps: Retrieve the grain from a hidden cache.
quests.success_outcome: The village receives the grain and offers their gratitude and home.
quests.failure_outcome: The village succumbs to starvation, the last voices lost.

quests.title: Whispers in the Ruins
quests.summary: Investigate the old cathedral for signs of life.
steps: Uncover the fate of its last inhabitants.
quests.success_outcome: You cleanse the spirits, bringing peace to the ruins.
quests.failure_outcome: The spirits wreak havoc on the nearby village.

quests.title: The Hunger Within
quests.summary: Help a companion facing their inner fears of starvation.
steps: Talk with the companion about their fears.
Gather ingredients to cook a meal together.
Share the meal during a vulnerable moment.
quests.success_outcome: The companion finds solace and strength in your bond.
quests.failure_outcome: The trauma resurfaces, straining your relationship.

quests.title: The Shattered Shrine
quests.summary: Rebuild a shrine for the forgotten gods to gain their favor.
steps: Collect rare materials from the land.
Convince others to donate out of desperation.
Face the consequences of reviving hope.
quests.success_outcome: The shrine is restored, and you receive a blessing.
quests.failure_outcome: The attempted restoration only brings more despair.

npcs.name: Edrin the Scavenger
npcs.personality: Skeptical and cunning, always weighing options.
secrets: Allied with famine beasts for profit.
hooks: Knows of an ancient blade hidden in the ruins.
Can provide rare items if helped.

npcs.name: Mira the Broken
npcs.personality: Haunted by visions, struggles with trust.
secrets: Once betrayed a friend for food.
hooks: Could aid in the quest if reassured.
Holds knowledge of the ruined cathedral.

npcs.name: Dalos the Forgotten
npcs.personality: Sad and resigned, speaks in riddles.
secrets: Guarding ancient texts about survival practices.
Knows the truth of the land's decay.
hooks: May help heal a lost spirit at a cost.

npcs.name: Selene of the Ashes
npcs.personality: Mysterious and cryptic, speaks of dreams.
secrets: Knows the outcomes of fate but won't share easily.
Has seen visions of the companions' deaths.
hooks: Can predict dangers ahead if sought.
Holds a fragment of the last grain of hope.

creatures.name: Famine Beast
creatures.behavior: Ambush predator, prowling the dark fields and ruins.
creatures.cr_hint: A gaunt form with feral eyes, hunger drives its madness.

creatures.name: Bone Colossus
creatures.behavior: Silent guardian of the ancient ruins, moves only to protect.
creatures.cr_hint: A massive figure made of twisted bones, emanating dread.

creatures.name: Hollow Wraith
creatures.behavior: Wanders in ruins, seeking solace in lost memories.
creatures.cr_hint: An echo of despair, its whispers chill the air.

creatures.name: Scavenger Swarm
creatures.behavior: Flocks together, overwhelming and consuming resources.
creatures.cr_hint: A mass of chitinous bodies moving as one, hungry.
